channel.title: Xcode Compiler Error on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in Xcode Compiler Error on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Swift Optionals? Don’t Forget to Unwrap!
item.description: There is a compiler error that throws me off every time I see it. It takes the form, ‘ClassName?’ does not have a member named ‘memberName’ This can happen when you’ve declared a variable as an optional, but forget to unwrap that optional when you attempt to call a method on it. For example, given this class definition: 1class Bird { 2 var family: String 3 var color: String 4 5 init(family: String, color: String) { 6 self.
